description: Enjoy a great pattern and even greater comfort with their Hike Light Fish Pattern Crew socks. These Merino wool hiking socks use their light cushioning, an elasticized arch brace for a secure fit, and a flat knit toe seam for additional comfort. Hike up and up and up with the natural benefits of responsibly sourced Merino wool.
name: Smartwool Hike Light Fish Pattern Crew Socks - Mens
